name: Mario and the Three Flowers
description:
This game was created for the Mario Fan Games Galaxy Jam 5. The Theme was 7th generation console games. I chose to make a game with the Nintendo DS resolution.

Game Engine-Godot

Art-Aseprite

Sound-BFXR

Music by Macroy(https://mfgg.net/index.php?act=resdb¶m=02&c=5&id=39364)

Background by  Shikaternia(https://mfgg.net/index.php?act=resdb¶m=02&c=1&id=38915)
